  7. subdir = src/backend/utils/adt
  8. top_builddir = ../../../..
  9. include $(top_builddir)/src/Makefile.global

  11. override CPPFLAGS := -I. -I$(srcdir) $(CPPFLAGS)

  13. # keep this list arranged alphabetically or it gets to be a mess

  124. # See notes in src/backend/parser/Makefile about the following two rules
  125. jsonpath_gram.h: jsonpath_gram.c
  126.     touch $@

  128. jsonpath_gram.c: BISONFLAGS += -d

  130. jsonpath_scan.c: FLEXFLAGS = -CF -p -p
  131. jsonpath_scan.c: FLEX_NO_BACKUP=yes

  133. # Force these dependencies to be known even without dependency info built:
  134. jsonpath_gram.o jsonpath_scan.o: jsonpath_gram.h

  136. clean:
  137.     rm -f lex.backup
  138.     rm -f jsonpath_gram.c jsonpath_gram.h jsonpath_scan.c

  140. like.o: like.c like_match.c

  142. # Some code in numeric.c benefits from auto-vectorization
  143. numeric.o: CFLAGS += ${CFLAGS_VECTORIZE}

  145. varlena.o: varlena.c levenshtein.c

  147. include $(top_srcdir)/src/backend/common.mk
